messages.itemAlreadyActive: The torch is already lit, you can't do anything else with it.
messages.itemActivated: A bright flame shines from the torch's head. It can be extinguished.

i001_stone.name: stone
i001_stone.lookDescription: A rough stone. You could throw it at something.

i002_shield.name: shield
i002_shield.lookDescription: A big shield. It can probably take a few hits.

i003_key.name: key
i003_key.lookDescription: This might be able to unlock a nearby door.

i004_fan.name: fan
i004_fan.lookDescription: A giant paper fan. You feel a cool breeze from waving it.

i005_flag.name: flag
i005_flag.lookDescription: A large flag. On the coat of arms you see a dragon.

i006_trident.name: trident
i006_trident.lookDescription: A heavy, ancient looking trident. The points look sharp!

messages.itemAlreadyActive: The violin is already being played.
messages.itemActivated: A soft beautiful melody comes from the violin.
messages.itemDeactivated: The violin's beautiful melody crescendos, diminuendos, and comes to an end.

messages.itemAlreadyActive: The octobass is already being played.
messages.itemActivated: A low, powerful, but soothing melody comes from the octobass.
messages.itemDeactivated: The octobass' bassy and supportive melody comes to an end.

i010_fish.name: fish
i010_fish.lookDescription: A fatty, oily, and delicious fish.
